about_the_game:
In a vast open world survival RPG, you will have the freedom to explore and thrive in diverse biomes: forests, deserts, mountains, and more, each with unique ecosystems and varied resources. With a robust building system, construct your base from scratch, customizing it with defensive structures, farming areas, and workshops. Utilize the farming system to plant and harvest food, essential for survival, or raise livestock for valuable resources.

Additionally, face creatures and explore dungeons filled with dangers and hidden secrets. The game offers a vast skill and equipment tree that allows you to customize your character to tackle the specific challenges of each environment. Dynamic weather and day-night cycles increase the difficulty, while resource management and strategic planning make each journey unique and challenging.

name: PolyRealms: The Lost Kingdom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870 or equivalent with 2 GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or equivalent with 4 GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: In this open world survival RPG, explore diverse biomes, gather resources, build shelters, and face unique creatures. Discover hidden dungeons, customize your character, and survive in a dynamic world full of adventures.
